ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:59:45 [Issue ID 4000-166358] urn:comicvine:4000-166358 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 07:28:06. [Issue ID 230706]
ComicInfo.Summary: Falling asleep for the first time in decades, the HellSpawn awakens to a bizarre and dangerous discovery. It seems, by mistake or design, that Hell has forgotten about Covenant. The result? A hideous object that holds the ultimate threat to the living world and the very life of the HellSpawn Covenant. Find out just what happens when HellSpawn meets HellSpawn.
ComicInfo.Title: The Seeding
